name: t-matrix
description: A small type-array based matrix lib. A core matrix type plus just the other functions you need.

scripts.coveralls: npm run cover && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.prepublish: npm test && npm run docs && npm run build
scripts.docs: jsdoc2md --template jsdoc2md/README.hbs --partial jsdoc2md/global-index-dl.hbs --partial jsdoc2md/body.hbs --files src/*.js > README.md & node ./jsdoc2md/post-process.js

author: Euan Smith <euan1971@yahoo.co.uk> (https://github.com/zakalwe314)
